title: Talking about positivity and close games
body:
Just had an ARAM game where we were sure it was over by the first 10 minutes, everyone just kept dying, there team was dealing so much damage and we were hopeless against them, they got our inhibitor and eventually our nexus was open. With a 5000+ health sion rapidly attacking the nexus you would be sure it was over, but nevertheless, I was GAREN and by the power of demacia we flipped the tables harder then gnar on a bad day.
http://imgur.com/YJnU8uA
^^^ gotta love imagining sion's rage after that ahahaha

replies.body: I don't think I've had a close game in many months. Games are either stomp or be stomped.
You've got the best Garen chroma too :D nice win!
